mapper.sql: UserID, UserCode, UserName, UserSex, UserPwd, UserBirth, UserAttributes
mapper.select: select username from USER where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select usercode from USER where usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into user (UserID, UserCode, UserName, UserSex, UserPwd, UserBirth, UserAttributes) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userbirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userattributes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

UserSex = #{usersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserPwd = #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
